notes.text:
This is the notification of the End Of Life plans for Red Hat 
CloudForms 2.0.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
In accordance with the Red Hat CloudForms Support Life Cycle Policy, 
support will end on April 10, 2016. Red Hat will not provide extended 
support for this product. Customers are requested to migrate to the 
newer Red Hat CloudForms product prior to the end of the life cycle 
for CloudForms 2.0. After April 10, 2016, technical support through 
Red Hat’s Global Support Services will no longer be provided. We 
encourage customers to plan their migration from Red Hat CloudForms
2.0 to the latest version of Red Hat CloudForms. Please contact
your Red Hat account representative if you have questions and/or 
concerns on this matter.

Full details of the Red Hat CloudForms Life Cycle can be found on the 
Red Hat website: 

https://access.redhat.com/support/policy/updates/cloudforms/
notes.title: Details

notes.title: Terms of Use

publisher.issuing_authority: Red Hat Product Security is responsible for vulnerability handling across all Red Hat products and services.

document.title: Red Hat Security Advisory: CloudForms 2.0 EOL
